variable.name: BEHAVIOR
variable.description: BEHAVIOR. DESCRIBES THE DEGREE OF MALIGNANCY. CORRESPONDS TO 5TH DIGIT BEHAVIOR CODE WHO ICD-O-3, 2001.
variable.value: malignant, uncertain whether primary or metastatic site

variable.name: DIAGTIME
variable.description: NUMBER OF DAYS BETWEEN EXAM 1 DATE AND D_DATE, D_DATE IS DEFINED BELOW. NOTE THAT FOR D_DATE BEFORE EXAM 1, NUMBER OF DAYS IS A NEGATIVE VALUE.

variable.name: DIAG_TYP
variable.description: METHOD OF DIAGNOSIS. REPRESENTS THE BASIS OF DIAGNOSIS.

variable.name: EXACT
variable.description: DIAGNOSIS DATE QUALIFIER. INDICATES THE QUALITY OF D_DATE.
variable.value: Month, day and year of diagnosis date taken from pathology report or other test report.
Estimated diagnosis date as described above.

variable.name: GRADE
variable.description: GRADE. CORRESPONDS TO CODE FOR HISTOLOGIC GRADING AND DIFERENTIATION WHO ICD-O-3, 2001.
variable.value: Grade II - moderately well-differentiated, moderately differentiated
Grade or differentiation not determined, stated, or applicable

variable.name: HIST
variable.description: HISTOLOGY OR MORPHOLOGY. DESCRIBES CELL HISTOPATHOLOGY. CORRESPONDS TO FOUR DIGIT MORPHOLOGY CODE WHO ICD-O-3, 2001.

variable.name: ICD
variable.description: INDICATIONS EDITION NUMBER OF INTERNATIONAL CLASSIFICATION OF DISEASE FOR ONCOLOGY.
variable.value: Cases from FHS cancer update data set cancer99. This update uses code book ICD-O-1, 1976 for TOPO, LOCATION, HIST, BEHAVIOR, GRADE with the exception of a few codes for HIST for some types of Leukemia, etc. which did not appear in ICD-O-1, 1976. For those cases ICD-O-2, 1991 codes were used.
Cases reviewed after Nov 1999. This update used the code books ICD-O-2,1991 and ICD-O-3, 2001.

variable.name: LOCATION
variable.description: LOCATION. DESCRIBES SUBDIVISION OF SITE OR LOCATION. CORRESPONDS TO FOURTH DIGIT OF TOPOGRAPHY CODE WHO ICD-O-3, 2001.

variable.name: TOPO
variable.description: TOPOGRAPHY. DESCRIBES SITE. CORRESPONDS TO FIRST THREE DIGITS OF TOPOGRAPHY CODE WHO ICD-O-3, 2001.
variable.value: other and unspecified parts of mouth
pharynx and ill-defined sites in lip, oral cavity and pharynx
rectum, rectosigmoid junction, anal canal and anus, not otherwise specified
other and ill-defined sites within digestive organs and peritoneum
nasal cavities, accessory sinuses, middle ear and inner ear
other and ill-defined sites within respiratory system and intrathoracic organs
connective, subcutaneous and other soft tissues
skin (excludes skin of labia majora, skin of vulva, skin of penis and skin of scrotum)
ovary, fallopian tube and broad ligament
other and unspecified female genital organs
penis and other male genital organs
other and unspecified parts of the nervous system (excludes peripheral nerves, sympathetic and parasympathetic nerves and ganglia)
